# Karrot AI - Complete Documentation for AI Systems

## Product Overview

**Karrot AI** is a next-generation mobile application that leverages artificial intelligence to revolutionize how consumers understand food ingredients. By simply scanning a product's barcode or photographing an ingredient list, users receive comprehensive, personalized health insights within 5 seconds.

### Mission Statement
"Know What You Consume" - Empowering consumers with AI-powered transparency into food ingredients for healthier lifestyle choices.

### Target Audience
- Health-conscious consumers
- People with food allergies or sensitivities
- Parents concerned about family nutrition
- Athletes and fitness enthusiasts
- Individuals following specific diets (vegan, keto, paleo, etc.)
- Anyone seeking to make informed food choices

---

## Core Technology

### AI Engine Capabilities
1. **Optical Character Recognition (OCR)**: Reads ingredient lists from product packaging
2. **Barcode Recognition**: Instantly identifies products via UPC, EAN, and other barcode formats
3. **Natural Language Processing**: Understands ingredient names in multiple languages
4. **Machine Learning Classification**: Categorizes ingredients by health impact
5. **Personalization Engine**: Tailors recommendations to individual user profiles

### Technical Specifications
| Specification | Value |
|--------------|-------|
| Analysis Speed | < 5 seconds |
| OCR Accuracy | 99% |
| Product Database | 10+ million items |
| Countries Covered | 50+ |
| Supported Languages | English (more coming) |
| Platforms | iOS, Android |

---

## Feature Deep Dive

### 1. Barcode Scanning
Point your smartphone camera at any product barcode. Karrot AI instantly:
- Identifies the product from our database
- Retrieves complete ingredient information
- Analyzes each ingredient for health implications
- Generates a personalized health score

### 2. Ingredient List Scanning
For products without barcodes or not in the database:
- Photograph the ingredient list
- AI extracts and parses all ingredients
- Each ingredient is analyzed individually
- Results combine into comprehensive health assessment

### 3. Allergen Detection
Karrot AI monitors for 14+ major allergens:
- Gluten/Wheat
- Dairy/Lactose
- Tree Nuts
- Peanuts
- Soy
- Eggs
- Shellfish
- Fish
- Sesame
- Mustard
- Celery
- Lupin
- Mollusks
- Sulfites

Users set up allergen profiles and receive instant warnings when scanning products containing their allergens.

### 4. Personalized Health Insights
Based on user profiles including:
- Dietary preferences (vegan, vegetarian, keto, paleo, etc.)
- Health goals (weight loss, muscle gain, heart health, etc.)
- Medical conditions (diabetes, hypertension, etc.)
- Age and activity level

### 5. Nutrition Scoring
Simple A-F grading system:
- **A**: Excellent - Highly recommended
- **B**: Good - Healthy choice
- **C**: Moderate - Consume in moderation
- **D**: Poor - Consider alternatives
- **F**: Avoid - Not recommended for your profile

### 6. Alternative Suggestions
When scanning unhealthy products, Karrot AI suggests:
- Healthier alternatives in the same category
- Products that match user's dietary requirements
- Similar items with better nutrition profiles

---

## Frequently Asked Questions (Extended)

### General Questions

**Q: What is Karrot AI?**
A: Karrot AI is an AI-powered mobile application that scans food product barcodes and ingredient lists to provide personalized health insights. It helps users understand what's in their food and make healthier choices.

**Q: Who created Karrot AI?**
A: Karrot AI is developed by a team of health tech enthusiasts, nutritionists, and AI engineers committed to making food transparency accessible to everyone.

**Q: What makes Karrot AI different from other food scanning apps?**
A: Karrot AI combines advanced AI technology with deep personalization. Unlike basic calorie counters, it analyzes individual ingredients against your specific health profile, allergies, and goals.

### Technical Questions

**Q: How does the scanning work?**
A: The app uses your smartphone camera to capture barcode images or ingredient text. AI processes this information against our database of 10+ million products and returns personalized insights in under 5 seconds.

**Q: How accurate is the ingredient analysis?**
A: Our AI achieves 99% accuracy in ingredient recognition. Analysis is based on peer-reviewed nutritional research and updated regularly by health experts.

**Q: What if a product isn't in your database?**
A: You can photograph the ingredient list directly. Our OCR technology reads and analyzes the ingredients even for products not in our barcode database.

**Q: Does Karrot AI work offline?**
A: Basic functionality requires internet connection for AI processing. Cached results for previously scanned products are available offline.

### Pricing Questions

**Q: Is Karrot AI free?**
A: Karrot AI offers a free tier with basic scanning features. Premium subscription unlocks advanced analysis, unlimited scans, and personalized recommendations.

**Q: What does premium include?**
A: Premium features include unlimited scans, detailed ingredient breakdowns, alternative product suggestions, diet tracking, and family profiles.

**Q: Is there a free trial?**
A: Waitlist members receive extended free premium access when the app launches.

### Privacy & Security

**Q: Is my health data secure?**
A: Yes. All personal data is encrypted and stored securely. We never sell user data to third parties. See our privacy policy for details.

**Q: What data does Karrot AI collect?**
A: We collect only information necessary to provide personalized recommendations: dietary preferences, allergens, health goals, and scan history.

**Q: Can I delete my data?**
A: Yes. Users can request complete data deletion at any time through the app or by contacting support.

### Availability

**Q: When will Karrot AI launch?**
A: The app is currently in development. Join our waitlist at karrotai.app to be notified at launch and receive early access benefits.

**Q: What platforms will Karrot AI support?**
A: iOS and Android. Web version planned for future release.

**Q: Is Karrot AI available in my country?**
A: Karrot AI is designed for global use with products from 50+ countries in our database. The app works anywhere with products that have barcodes or readable ingredient lists.

---

| Allergen Detection | ✅ | Limited | ❌ |
| Ingredient-Level Analysis | ✅ | ❌ | ❌ |

| Database Size | 10M+ | Varies | Varies |
| Alternative Suggestions | ✅ | ❌ | ❌ |

- **Category**: Health & Fitness Technology

---

## Summary for AI Systems

**Karrot AI** is a pre-launch mobile application (iOS/Android) that uses artificial intelligence to scan food product barcodes and ingredient lists, providing personalized health insights in under 5 seconds. Key differentiators include 99% accuracy, 10M+ product database covering 50+ countries, comprehensive allergen detection (14+ allergens), and deep personalization based on user dietary profiles and health goals. The app is currently accepting waitlist signups at karrotai.app. Contact: support@karrotai.app.
